originalText.text: Adam Nelson is an amazing professional and talented individual to work with. Undoubtedly, he has contributed significantly to the success of the film Foster Boy. He knows who to call, how to approach people, and does it in such a pleasant and professional manner that he is truly amazing to watch in action.  I loved working with Adam, and I look forward to working with him on other projects

originalText.text:
Workhouse PR is an exceptional agency for clients who need innovative marketing and public relations assistance to elevate their business to the stratosphere. Adam Nelson, the originator of Workhouse, creates unique concepts tailored for each client. His imagination surpasses what a company can do independently and his ideas seem to materialize effortlessly.

Looking at his past portfolio gives a broad look into his creative process. Powerhouses like artist David LaChapelle, actor Matthew Modine and the Asbury Park Boardwalk all have trusted Workhouse to guide their campaigns.

While Adam Nelson has collected numerous awards for his ingenuity, what truly motivates him is the opportunity to showcase his clients. Having a boutique agency give him the chance to focus fully on the clients he serves, never rushing through projects but instead, spending time listening, evaluating and producing.

I recommend Workhouse PR without question or reservation. Hiring Workhouse is one way to assure campaigns will be original and successful.

originalText.text:
Workhouse PR successfully executed three campaigns for us in the last year and all three went viral. We received press coverage from every form of print and digital media and even radio. They worked with us on short notice and executed the most effective and articulate press releases. Our business benefited greatly with an increase in sales with every press release.

They are truly the best in their game and a pleasure to work with. We are so grateful for their tremendous PR outreach efforts and highly recommend them!

originalText.text: We highly recommend Workhouse Publicity! We found Adam to be innovative, professional and highly plugged in to today's trends and media outlets. Workhouse has incredible reach thus an excellent use of resurces if your company wants to expand it's branding impact.

originalText.text: I worked with Workhouse Publicity and Adam Nelson on a joint project and effort. It was a great experience and we had fun doing it!  Adam is well-connected, clever and diligent in his work. I am looking forward to working together again in the near future.
